mapper.select: SELECT * FROM course_table WHERE Course_id=#{id} AND Course_name=#{name};
mapper.insert: insert into course_table (Course_id, Course_name, Class_name,Term, Room_num, Teacher,Start_time, End_time) values (#{courseId}, #{courseName}, #{class_name},#{term}, #{roomNum}, #{teacher},#{startTime}, #{endTime});
